q1: Do you think this team will qualify for the next World Cup?
a1: Yes, they have a chance of winning the tournament if all goes their way.
q2: Do you think Ronaldo will still be playing with Portugal by then?
a2: No, hes already 33, too old for Portugal now.
q3: When do you think Ronaldo will retire from the national team of portugal?
a3: I think he will retire for the next world cup
q4: Who do you think will step up in Ronaldo's place for Portugal?
a4: Replacing Ronaldo will be difficult but I would like to see Kylian Mbappe join Real Madrid.
q5: Who would be a good fit to replace him though?
